trans-unit.source: Provides <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement"></xref> objects for each state of the rightmost item of the header control.

Each property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Header.ItemRight> class gets a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> for a different state of the rightmost header item.
Gets a visual style element that represents the rightmost header item in the hot state.

You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Header.ItemRight.Hot%2A> property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement"></xref> that represents the rightmost header item in the hot state.
Gets a visual style element that represents the rightmost header item in the normal state.

You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Header.ItemRight.Normal%2A> property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement"></xref> that represents the rightmost header item in the normal state.
Gets a visual style element that represents the rightmost header item in the pressed state.

You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Header.ItemRight.Pressed%2A> property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement"></xref> that represents the rightmost header item in the pressed state.
